attributes.action: stop all sale of endangerd fish species in all government resturants including parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment endangered and low stock fish species IE Monkfish, is being sold in Parliaments resturant, and no doubt in other departments resturants.
This petition is to remind all our political servants of their interest in the apalling low stocks of fish which they are well aware of.
